name: Light AT Gun Pack
detailed_description:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic anti-tanks guns from 1940



No subscription is required to purchase or play this content. This is a one time purchase pack.

Become an anti-tank gunner and destroy enemy light tanks, medium tanks and armored cars. Your armored piercing rounds well placed will have devastating effects against early war vehicles! This is vital in the game to keep your spawn points clear of enemy vehicles. You'll move very fast and be highly concealable. Become a gunner now!

This pack includes...

  • German PaK 36 (37mm) Anti-Tank Gun
  • British 2 Pounder (40mm) Anti-Tank Gun
  • French SA mle 34 (25mm) Anti-Tank Gun
  • US SA mle 34 (25mm) Anti-Tank Gun)

short_description: Become an anti-tank gunner and destroy enemy light tanks, medium tanks and armored cars. Your armored piercing rounds well placed will have devastating effects against early war vehicles! Deploy-able at mobile spawns!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
